content.rendered:
Flomny is a Professor of Holistic Business leadership at Longford College, James lind Institute and Uninettuno University. She is also a visiting lecturer for universities in UK. Flomny is, without a doubt, one of the most approachable people in the industry today. She sees possibilities in every business model, and has been known to launch, execute and deliver over a hundred partnerships in a span of twenty years. She is sector agnostic and is known to convert even the most impossible business propositions into inevitable success stories. She was responsible for shaping award-winning brands globally and has worked with ambitious brands like Chelsea Football Club, South Kensington club, Six senses and Jumeirah Hospitality. She is an author, motivational speaker and is part of Inspiring the future, UK.

She has a degree in Hospitality Management from Michigan State University, Leadership from Harvard, an MBA and a Doctorate in Business Administration from University of Wales and executive development programmes from MIT and University of Pennsylvania and currently pursuing Machine learning from Harvardx.
